translation.en: And they have an entirely different pattern and diameter,
translation.ja: 形も直径も違うから― 別の何かもいたってことね

translation.en: which means a completely different thing was here.
translation.ja: 別の何かもいたってことね

translation.en: Okay, CSI: Rhode Island.

translation.en: -Your funeral. -Ow.

translation.en: -Jump on. The clock's ticking. -[starts engine]

translation.en: -[whimpers] -[Liz] Hang on, Carmella.

translation.en: -♪ Get ready for the show-ow… ♪ -We've got Toadies on our hands. Bring me up on the tracker.

translation.en: Are you talking to me?

translation.en: Pull up a map of their main tunnels.
translation.ja: トンネルの地図も出して

translation.en: -"Tunnels"? -Will you knock it off?

translation.en: No! Not you, just some girl.

translation.en: GPR activity near Sharkie Park? Copy that.

translation.en: ♪ And it's gone runnin' ♪ ♪ Trouble's comin' ♪

translation.en: -[Kelly] GPR? -[Liz] Ground-penetrating radar.

translation.en: Toadies have a network of tunnels under the city. Sometimes our monster GPR picks up their movements.

translation.en: -[Kelly] We're not going in the tunnels. -[Liz] Nope.

translation.en: -[clang] -[Liz] We are fishing for Toadies.

translation.en: [Kelly] Ball pits. So gross.

translation.en: Like, gross to the third power.

translation.en: [Liz] Math jokes, huh? Funny.
translation.ja: 数学のジョークか　笑える

translation.en: Anyway, look for a hidden tunnel. Should be around here somewhere.
translation.ja: トンネルを探そうこの辺りだよ

translation.en: -[Kelly] How do you know all this stuff? -[Liz] Check the bag.
translation.ja: なぜ分かるの？ バッグを

translation.en: "Babysitter's Guide to Monster Hunting"?

translation.en: [Liz] It's a collection of thousands of years' worth of monster hunting wisdom passed down through the ages.

translation.en: Memorize the guide, stay alive.

translation.en: So I'm not crazy.
translation.ja: 私は正気だった

translation.en: [Liz] Found it.
translation.ja: 発見

translation.en: -I mean, can you believe this? -[babbling]

translation.en: Uh, the Toadies dug their tunnel right at the end of the slide,
translation.ja: 滑り台の下に掘った

translation.en: so when a kid comes shooting down… Whoosh! Right into their trap.
translation.ja: 子供が滑り降りたらワナに はまるように

translation.en: -[Carmella cooing] -[Kelly] This is insane. What should I do?
translation.ja: ひどいわね私は何をすべき？

translation.en: -Maybe take off her jacket? -Okay.
translation.ja: 上着を脱がせて

translation.en: -[Kelly] Why do you need baby powder? -[sighs]

translation.en: -[Liz] Read the guide. -[cooing]
translation.ja: ガイドを読んで

translation.en: [Liz] All right, come on.
translation.ja: 行くよ

translation.en: "Beware. Toadies love the smell of newborns. They cannot resist a taste."
translation.ja: “ゲロゲロたちは新生児の匂いが大好き”

translation.en: One of 'em pops out looking for a snack, boom, got 'em.
translation.ja: 食べようとする時に捕まえる

translation.en: You're using the baby as bait? No!

translation.en: Listen, this is the only thing that will get them up to the surface.

translation.en: -[Kelly] What's that? -[rumbling]

translation.en: -Those are sound vibrations. -[Carmella cooing]

translation.en: -I can't do this! -Kelly! No!

translation.en: [Liz] Oh, come on!

translation.en: By the Order of the Babysitters, I demand you return that child!
translation.ja: 子守団だその子を返してもらう

translation.en: -[Jacob crying] -Come on!

translation.en: Don't worry, Carmella. I'm gonna keep you safe.

translation.en: -[growls] -[Liz] Hey, hey! Hey, hey! Look what I've got.

translation.en: If you give us the boy, you get sparkly.

translation.en: -What do you say? -[chatters]

translation.en: [Liz] Come on, don't play hardball with me. -You guys love to trade. -[Kelly muttering]

translation.en: -[phone playing music] -Okay. Damn.

translation.en: Shut that off!

translation.en: Ms. Zellman?

translation.en: What?

translation.en: Jacob and I are having so much fun.

translation.en: Uh… It's… it's a movie.

translation.en: That sounds like a scary movie. Check the list, Kelly. No scary movies.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! It's-- it's a fun movie.

translation.en: -It's about unicorns and rainbows and… -[Toadie chattering and growling]

translation.en: What was that?

translation.en: -A… unicorn fell off a… a rainbow. -[Toadie squealing]

translation.en: [Kelly] But it was saved by a cloud. We're all good here.

translation.en: Um, no, he's sleeping.

translation.en: You said you were watching a movie.

translation.en: No, he just-- he just fell asleep like that.

translation.en: He did?

translation.en: [laughs] Oh. That's a first.

translation.en: Tonight is a night of firsts.
translation.ja: 今夜は初めての連続です

translation.en: -[squealing] -Yeah. Me too.

translation.en: Remember. Midnight.

translation.en: -Okay. Bye. Bye. -Sharp.

translation.en: So, how are we gonna get him back now?

translation.en: That's why this little creep's comin' with us.

translation.en: -[Carmella coos] -It's nine o'clock, Carmella.

translation.en: -We'll get you home, sweetie. -[cooing]

translation.en: The Toadies always trade. This is worse than I thought.

translation.en: Oh, hootie-hoo! Well, well, well.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I forgot.

translation.en: -I wanna go home! -You're not going anywhere.

translation.en: Huh? Impressive, isn't it?

translation.en: I suppose you want to know how it all works.

translation.en: and mixed them with the perfect specificity.
translation.ja: 適切な割合で混ぜ合わせた

translation.en: Why, you ask?

translation.en: To fill these beautiful tanks with enough power

translation.en: to manifest my army of nightmares into actual life!

translation.en: Aah! Terrors alive like never seen before.

translation.en: All I needed was just one more little tiny ingredient,

translation.en: a pathetic yet highly imaginative little twerp, personified in this case by… well…

translation.en: you, get it?

translation.en: You, my dear boy,

translation.en: will conjure an army of infinite nightmares.

translation.en: I hope she wasn't too freaked out.

translation.en: Is that the going rate these days for using a baby as bait?

translation.en: You work for Brown University?

translation.en: -Something like that. -What's in the bag?

translation.en: -♪ Oh, no, no, no… ♪ -My professor.

translation.en: -We're throwing the Toadie in the trash? -[growling]

translation.en: Yeah. That's exactly what we're doing.

translation.en: ♪ I want you to be mon amour ♪

translation.en: Welcome to the Rhode Island chapter of the Order of the Babysitters.

translation.en: We're part of a super secret organization with chapters all around the world.

translation.en: The Greek goddess, Artemis,
translation.ja: ギリシャ女神のアルテミスや― ギリシャ女神のアルテミスや―〝ジャンヌ･ダルク〞

translation.en: Cleopatra, Merlin, Rosa Parks, all babysitters.
translation.ja: ギリシャ女神のアルテミスや―〝ジャンヌ･ダルク〞 〝ジャンヌ･ダルク〞 〝ジャンヌ･ダルク〞クレオパトラも子守だった クレオパトラも子守だった

translation.en: Archimedes, Frida Kahlo,

translation.en: Florence Nightingale,

translation.en: Maria Tallchief, Noor Inayat Khan.

translation.en: [Liz] Yeah. We've been around for thousands of years.

translation.en: Tell anyone about our location, and I'll feed you to our resident hobgoblin.

translation.en: Listen up, SITs. Our mission is Jacob Zellman.

translation.en: Five years old, possibly with the Gift of Dreams.

translation.en: We have three hours and five minutes until his mom gets back

translation.en: and finds her little bundle of joy missing.

translation.en: Nothing new from the surveillance cameras.
translation.ja: 監視カメラには何も

translation.en: Hey, Berna, will you start the laser scan?

translation.en: -On it. -[bleep]

translation.en: [girl] All right. Let's take a look in this Toadie's pouch.

translation.en: What the heck? Is that half a duck?

translation.en: [Kelly] It's a goose lamp.

translation.en: -How big are their pouches? -Who's the human?

translation.en: This is Kelly.

translation.en: [girl] And why exactly is she here?

translation.en: She was with the kid when he got taken.

translation.en: -We need to pick her brain. -But--

translation.en: Just search the thing for clues.

translation.en: Rude. It's not a "thing."

translation.en: It's a Monstria Chordata Amphibia Carnivora of the Toadie subspecies.

translation.en: -[sighs] Remove her. -Cassie, this isn't your call.

translation.en: You're just a Sitter in Training.
translation.ja: キャシーあんたは まだ研修生だ

translation.en: I mean, see this? And this?
translation.ja: これを見てよ これと これも

translation.en: And this?

translation.en: Chapter Vice President. Okay?
translation.ja: 私は副支部長

translation.en: It's gonna take me hours to remove the items from its pouch.
translation.ja: 袋から取るには数時間かかる

translation.en: Better get to it, then.
translation.ja: なら早くして

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. So sorry. -[Liz] Follow me.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: Hey. So, this Jacob kid really has the Gift of Dreams?
translation.ja: あの子には本当に夢の才能が？
私は…

translation.en: I just told her what Jacob told me.
translation.ja: 彼が言ったことを伝えただけ

translation.en: I don't even really know what the Gift of Dreams is.

translation.en: It's-- it's legendary. A young kid who is supposed to be able to bring dreams to life.
translation.ja: 夢を実現させる力を持ってる子がいる

translation.en: Or nightmares.
translation.ja: 悪夢もね

translation.en: The Order was founded to protect kids like that.
translation.ja: そんな子を守るために子守団が設立された

translation.en: I could tell you a bit more over a cup of coffee, maybe?

translation.en: Pump the brakes, Casanova. Can you make one of your memory potions?
translation.ja: ナンパしてる場合？記憶想起薬を作って

translation.en: Uh… Yeah. I, uh… I have a passion for potions.
translation.ja: 了解 薬を作るのが得意でね

translation.en: -[Kelly] What is that? -It's Minotaur Memory Dust.
translation.ja: それは？ ミノタウルスの記憶の粉だ甲虫根が３で小鬼糞が１

translation.en: Three parts beetle root, one part gnome guano.
translation.ja: ミノタウルスの記憶の粉だ甲虫根が３で小鬼糞が１

translation.en: Yet, I have not tested this batch out yet, so I hope I don't fry her brain.
translation.ja: 強度は未確認だ脳がダメになるかも

translation.en: Fry my brain…
translation.ja: それを私に？

translation.en: Now, tell us every single detail you remember when Jacob was taken.
translation.ja: 子供がさらわれた時の詳細を教えて

translation.en: ♪ Do as, mm-mmm ♪

translation.en: ♪ Now give into the mm-mm-mmm ♪
translation.ja: 内面の暗闇に…

translation.en: Maybe I used too much beetle root?

translation.en: No, I…
translation.ja: この歌…

translation.en: I heard that song when I was a little girl…

translation.en: [male voice] Ah, Kelly Ferguson.

translation.en: I've been looking for a girl who can make her dreams come to life,
translation.ja: 夢を実現させる力がある子を探してた

translation.en: and now here you are.
translation.ja: やっと 見つけたよ

translation.en: And you're all mine.

translation.en: ♪ Do as you're told ♪
translation.ja: 言うことを聞け

translation.en: ♪ Now give into the darkness inside ♪
translation.ja: 内面の暗闇に溺れろ

translation.en: ♪ Heavy eyelids sink deep ♪
translation.ja: 重たいまぶたが

translation.en: -[Kelly sings along] -♪ In the clutches of sleep ♪
translation.ja: 君を深い眠りへと沈める

translation.en: ♪ Mmm, listen ♪

translation.en: [man and choir] ♪You'll do as you're told ♪

translation.en: [Cassie] Why did it stop on the Grand Guignol?
